an4.46:4.1: Then, when the night had passed, the Buddha addressed the mendicants:
an4.46:4.2: “Tonight, the beautiful god Rohitassa, lighting up the entire Jeta’s Grove, came to me,
an4.46:4.5: “Sir, is it possible to know or see or reach the end of the world by travelling to a place where there’s no being born, growing old, dying, passing away, or being reborn?” …
